sentence.text: The expression of uncarboxylated cartilage condensation (ucMGP), carboxylated MGP (cMGP), matrix metalloproteinase (MMP)-13, collagen type X, collagen type II, tumor necrosis factor (protein import into nucleus, translocation)-a and interleukin (IL)-1b were detected by ELISA, immunohistochemistry, reverse transcription-quantitative polymerase chain reaction and western blotting.
